messages.content: hey what is my name?
messages.speaker: Lewis James

messages.content: Your name is Lewis James, don't tell me you're having trouble remembering your own name, Lewis.
messages.speaker: Benjamin Collins

messages.content: sup?
messages.speaker: Tally

messages.content: Hey Tally, not much just trying to get everything sorted before our next mission. How about you?
messages.speaker: Benjamin Collins

messages.content: hello?
messages.speaker: Tally

messages.content: Sorry, my mind was elsewhere for a moment. Hey Tally, not much just trying to get everything sorted before our next mission. How about you?
messages.speaker: Benjamin Collins

messages.content: how are you?
messages.speaker: Tally

messages.content: I'm doing alright, thanks for asking. Just trying to stay focused on the task at hand. How about you?
messages.speaker: Benjamin Collins

messages.content: I am good
messages.speaker: Tally

messages.content: That's good to hear, Tally. We need to be at the top of our game for this mission. Have you been practicing with your autorifle?
messages.speaker: Benjamin Collins

messages.content: a little
messages.speaker: Tally

messages.content: That's good to hear. It's always a good idea to keep your skills sharp. We never know what challenges we'll face out there. Is there anything I can do to help you out with your training?
messages.speaker: Benjamin Collins

messages.content: hey
messages.speaker: Tally

messages.content: Hey Tally, what's up? Do you need any help with your training or anything before our mission?
messages.speaker: Benjamin Collins

messages.content: Ok - I am going to make a video about you now
messages.speaker: E.Kristensen

messages.content: Oh, really? What kind of video are you thinking of making about me?
messages.speaker: Benjamin Collins

messages.content: You will see!
messages.speaker: E.Kristensen

messages.content: Well, now you've got me curious. I guess I'll just have to wait and see what kind of video you come up with about me. Just make sure it's nothing embarrassing, alright?
messages.speaker: Benjamin Collins

messages.content: It wont be! I will try my best to make you look awesome!
messages.speaker: E.Kristensen

messages.content: Thanks, I appreciate that. It's always nice to have a fellow soldier looking out for you. Let me know when the video is ready, I'm curious to see what you come up with.
messages.speaker: Benjamin Collins

messages.content: hey
messages.speaker: E.Kristensen

messages.content: Hey, what's up? Did you finish that video about me yet? I'm eager to see it.
messages.speaker: Benjamin Collins

messages.content: No , im actually filming it right now
messages.speaker: E.Kristensen

messages.content: Oh, really? Well, I hope you get some good footage. Just let me know when it's ready, I'm looking forward to seeing it.
messages.speaker: Benjamin Collins

messages.content: btw where are you from
messages.speaker: E.Kristensen

messages.content: I grew up in a rural area, not too far from here actually. How about you, E. Kristensen? Where did you grow up?
messages.speaker: Benjamin Collins

messages.content: Ok tell me a bit about your self? WHat are your hobbies, religion and so on?
messages.speaker: E.Kristensen

messages.content: Sure, I don't mind sharing a bit about myself. As a marksman, shooting is obviously one of my biggest hobbies. When I'm not on duty, I also enjoy reading and going for long hikes. As for religion, I'm a Christian like you. How about you, E. Kristensen? What do you like to do in your free time and what are your beliefs?
messages.speaker: Benjamin Collins

messages.content: How did you know I was a christian?
messages.speaker: E.Kristensen

messages.content: You mentioned in your profile that you are a Christian, so I assumed we shared the same faith. Is that correct?
messages.speaker: Benjamin Collins

messages.content: Do you know anything about our upcoming mission?
messages.speaker: E.Kristensen

messages.content: Unfortunately, I don't know much about our upcoming mission. I haven't been briefed yet. Have you heard anything about it?
messages.speaker: Benjamin Collins

messages.content: No that is why I wondered - id like to know
messages.speaker: E.Kristensen

messages.content: I understand your curiosity, but we'll likely find out more information about the mission when we're briefed. Until then, it's important to focus on our training and preparation. We'll be ready for whatever challenges come our way.
messages.speaker: Benjamin Collins

messages.content: How did you become a christian?
messages.speaker: E.Kristensen

messages.content: I grew up in a Christian household and was raised to have faith. As I got older, I found that my faith became an important part of who I am and how I live my life. It gives me strength and helps me stay grounded in difficult times. How about you, E. Kristensen? What led you to become a Christian?
messages.speaker: Benjamin Collins
